title: apparently theres only one way to keep an akali from facefrolling after 6 and gunblade
body:
perma ban her :') she cant murder you without taking any damage (becuz healz) if shes not in your games in the first place.
it really sucks i have to perma ban a champion just so they cant faceroll in literally every game ever no matter how bad or good they did in lane.
